title: Group Therapy: Her Boyfriend Interrupted Her Daughter's Sleepover
description: Courtney emailed us about if something her boyfriend did is a red flag.  Her teenage daughter was having a sleepover and the girls slept in until noon.  Her boyfriend needed something from the basement and they were sleeping down their so he ended up going down and waking them up so he could get into the storage room.  She's wondering if this is a red flag because he invaded their privacy or they should have been up since it was so late?
